keyEvents.title: Robin Accused of Attacking Iceburg
keyEvents.description: The revelation that Robin attacked Iceburg spreads through Water 7, turning the city against the Straw Hats.
keyEvents.significance: This event transforms Water 7 from a welcoming shipbuilding city into a hostile environment for the Straw Hats.

keyEvents.title: Aqua Laguna Warning
keyEvents.description: The approaching Aqua Laguna, an incredibly high tide unique to Water 7, is announced as an imminent threat to the city.
keyEvents.significance: The Aqua Laguna becomes a major time constraint and environmental factor in the Water 7 arc's climax.

geography.description: A water city built on top of old ruins with canals throughout. Known for its shipbuilding industry and regular high tides called Aqua Laguna.
geography.climate: Maritime climate with extreme periodic flooding from Aqua Laguna

statusHistory.description: Water 7 is accessible to visitors and ships

name.japanese: ガレーラカンパニー本部

keyEvents.title: Galley-La Foremen vs Luffy
keyEvents.description: The Galley-La foremen attack Luffy inside the headquarters, declaring the Straw Hats wanted dead or alive.
keyEvents.significance: The headquarters transforms from a place of business into a battleground.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Infiltrates to See Iceburg
keyEvents.description: Luffy bursts through a window to infiltrate the heavily guarded Galley-La headquarters.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the building under lockdown with shipwrights acting as guards to protect the injured Iceburg.

keyEvents.title: Iceburg's Emotional Request
keyEvents.description: In Iceburg's room within the headquarters, he tearfully requests that Luffy bring Robin to him.
keyEvents.significance: The headquarters becomes the site of crucial revelations about the attack on Iceburg.

geography.description: The main office building of the Galley-La Company, the largest shipbuilding company in Water 7. Contains Iceburg's office and workspace.

statusHistory.description: After Iceburg's attack, the headquarters is heavily guarded by shipwrights
